text: Monosexism is the belief that monosexuality is superior to other sexual orientations, such as bisexuals, pansexuals, omnisexuals and polysexuals. Some see bisexuals as promiscuous. ==Overview== It describes a form of discrimination that includes biphobia and panphobia as an extension of heterosexism, enforcing androphilia and gynephilia as an strict dichotomy. ==References== Category:Human sexuality
title: Monosexism
